title: Technical SEO - Page 3 of 3 - SEO Blog by Ahrefs
description: Technical SEO helps search engines find, crawl, and index the pages on your website. You won't get any organic traffic if they can't do this. Check out the resources below to learn how to fix common technical issues. - Page 3
